statements: DELETE FROM alarms_and_alerts WHERE device_id = 100 AND alarm_type = 'Temperature Alert';
DELETE FROM alarms_and_alerts WHERE alarm_type = 'Critical' AND device_id = 5
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_message LIKE '%critical%' AND alert_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE severity > 3 AND alert_type = 'Critical';
DELETE FROM alarms WHERE device_id = 1001 AND alarm_id = 1;
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE device_id = 2002 AND alert_type = 'Critical';
